metadata.name: Enemy Variant Pack
metadata.description: [img]http://i.imgur.com/sKC1y1V.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/PDiIKyo.jpg[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/HfXN4LH.jpg[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/pTIpwGf.jpg[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/zFZNywr.jpg[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/ZVvcW0i.jpg[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/izx3yPC.jpg[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/p861NGS.jpg[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/swdGYrx.jpg[/img] By default all of the variants have 20% chance to appear in place of corresponding enemy. You can easily adjust spawn chance or disable some variants in config.lua file in the mod's directory (Documents/My Games/The Binding of Isaac Afterbirth+ Mods/enemyvariantpack_925168037)
